long_description: The ECOXGEAR ECOROX Bluetooth waterproof speaker pumps out rich deep sound with wireless ease, perfect for playing your favorite summer tunes while you're out on the water. Play your music from any Bluetooth-enabled device, including smartphones, tablets and laptops. Never miss a call-the ECOROX has a built-in speaker phone. Mount your ECOROX on handlebars or dashboards and listen to your tunes all day. Drop the ECOROX in your pool, lake, or river-no worries, it floats! Integrated, full-range 6-watt stereo speakers feature a top-mounted bass radiator. Lithium rechargeable 7.4V/1800mAh battery offers10+ hrs. of play time so you don't miss a beat. The ECOXGEAR ECOROX Bluetooth waterproof speaker has an IPX7 rating for protection against water immersion down to 1m for 30 min.
short_description: The ECOXGEAR ECOROX Bluetooth waterproof speaker pumps out rich deep sound with wireless ease, perfect for playing your favorite summer tunes while you're out on the water.
